channel.title: Helpers on DocuAPI Example Site
channel.description: Recent content in Helpers on DocuAPI Example Site

item.description: API Gateway Proxy (HTTP) There are quite a few helpers for working with API Gateway Proxy responses and requests. You can read about all of them through Go documentation. APIGatewayProxyResponse APIGatewayProxyRequest Though let’s take a look at some of the more common ones here. APIGatewayProxyRequest API Gateway requests are not HTTP requests. They come into Lambda as JSON messages. The AWS Lambda Go package, and therefore Aegis, marshals these messages to structs.
